data.name: Gutting Goblins! Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Needing a good tune to kill things to? We got your back! The Gutting Goblins! Official Soundtrack is the perfect thing to listen to while streaming, while working out, or slaughtering goblins by the masses! Eloquently composed by Colin Sutton, our soundtrack will keep you musically fulfilled.
data.about_the_game: Needing a good tune to kill things to? We got your back! The Gutting Goblins! Official Soundtrack is the perfect thing to listen to while streaming, while working out, or slaughtering goblins by the masses! Eloquently composed by Colin Sutton, our soundtrack will keep you musically fulfilled.
data.short_description: The Official Gutting Goblins! soundtrack, with it's genre based in metal.
